Title: Sharepoint Rate Field Type
Description:
Sharepoint field type to rate elements from 1 to 5, representing the rating with stars in list view. It can be use to rate knowledge base articles or any other article or item. This project is in C#, i try to do the same with VB but doesn't work, if some one wants to try it please tell me, I don't know where is the problem.

Some of the base code was taken from the project "SharePoint 2007 WCM Field Controls". Thanks.
